text.value: 1.11. Number of members in your household?
2. What is your approximate monthly income from agriculture in KES?
3. What is the range number of goats in your farm?
4. What other animals except goats are reared by the household? Tick in the box
5. What do you do when animals fall sick?
What do you do when animals fall sick? (Other)
6. Are there any animals under treatment currently?
6.1 If yes, which treatment is in use?
7. What do you do when animals fail to respond to the given treatments?
8. What do you use animal manure for?
9. What do you do when your crops are infected with infectious diseases?
10. Do you practice farming as a source of income?
11. Apart from farming, what is the other income-generating activity for your household?
12. What kind of toilet do you have?
13. Are there known industries around the areas that drain their industrial effluents into the lakes?
14. What is the main source of your drinking water?
15. How do you treat your drinking water?
Filtration ( using charcoal/a piece of cloth)
Other mechanism of treating your drinking water
16. What do you when a family member is unwell?
17. What do you do when a family member fails to respond to the given treatments?
20. How long does it take to the nearest healthcare center by walking? (In minutes)
Answer given can be in hours, then convert to minutes
